name: FormworkBD
overview:
FormworkBD is a group of web designers and programmers being in the business since 2010. Our web developers highly expirienced in the following technologies PHP, MySQL, XML, AJAX, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Flash and various graphical programs. Favorite web frameworks are Django, Ruby on Rails, Symphony. Prefered CMS systems - Joomla, Wordpress.

Whether you are an individual requiring a small website or a large corporation requiring a much more intricate website / intranet system, our dedication is uncompromising. Website development is not just our job itâ€™s our passion…
